channel.title: WarScape 317 | Battle-scape Feel | Eco/Pk
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1547zte.png[/img][/CENTER]
[FONT=Impact][CENTER][SIZE=5]WarScape 317[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Current Stage : Beta [CENTER][url=http://war-scape.com/forum/]Portal[/url] [url=http://war-scape.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url][/CENTER]
WarScape 317 was made to feel like Battle-scape 1 with a little twist on things. I loved playing bs1 pretty shur a lot other's did to. My partner and I put in a lot of work to be getting this done. Everything was made for a Eco/Pk community. We are still editing the mini-games also finding more and more bugs. Were intending to take a lot of suggestions to make the game more better for you.
[SIZE=3][FONT=Arial Black]What The Server Comes With :[/FONT] [SIZE=2]- Niet Home - Slayer dungeons - Spirit Tree Teleportation - Almost all skills working except, runecrafting - Fight Pits - Mage Mini-Game - Skilling Home - Caskets - Crystal Chest[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Arial Black]Pictures :[/FONT]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/29og4s4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zb6ia8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/zj6i3k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/mv47eq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/vpybfo.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
